Name: The Opening Act
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.
Review: Bitter liqueur and ginger topped with tonic, a surprisingly good combo. Adult and balanced. A great long drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe originally created by Andrew Pollard for the 2010 Domaine de Canton Bartender of the Year competition winning 'Best Overall Cocktail'.
Nutrition: One serving of The Opening Act contains 226 calories
